targets.expr: label_replace(sum(rate(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval])) by (service) / sum(rate(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval])) by (service), "service", "$1", "service", "([^-]+-[^@]+)@.*")
